constructor.details: Constructor, sets price, token, wallet and access control state vars

params._accessControl: Contract that manages issuers and institutions
params._token: Token used to pay for certificates
params._wallet: Address to which payments are transfered

params._certificateAddress: Address of the certificate to be invalidated

params._email: Token used to pay for certificates

params._newPrice: new Price (same decimal places as the token)
